Anyone else having issues with the sound using PS3 media server? Same issue with E01 but can't seem to find the source of the problem.
I´ve also got that soundproblem with PMS. It works just fine until the titlesong, then it sounds like it´s backwards or something. :(

A workaround I found with PMS is to force stereo sound by setting the Maximum Number of audio channels to 2 for AC-3 re-encoding under Common Transcode Settings.  The show starts in stereo but then changes to 5.1.. and PMS apparently can't handle it.  If anyone knows of another way let me know.
